name: Learn JavaScript
description: Learn JavaScript is an offline app made for aspiring programmers and web developers. You do not need a prior knowledge in JavaScript to start. This app covers from JavaScript basic to advance concepts.  This app has 22 lessons from JavaScript introduction to Advance JavaScript designed for anyone to start learn. Some of the features of this app includes:  * From basic JavaScript to Advance JavaScript in 22 lessons * Clear and concise code samples * Read anytime and anywhere without an internet connection * Practice Quizzes to make you understand the topics * Achievements to make the learning more interesting * JavaScript articles to keep you up to date. * Sign-in to save and restore your status on any device * Practice on any chapters to test your understanding  and much more to come in near future. The lessons are grouped in 22 chapters which are   JavaScript Introduction  Variables  Operators  Control Flow  Loops and Iteration  Functions  Arrays  JavaScript Objects - Part 1  JavaScript Objects - Part 2  Intermediate JavaScript 1  Intermediate JavaScript 2  Intermediate JavaScript 3  Prototypes in Inheritance  Object Oriented JavaScript  ES6 Part 1  ES6 Part 2  JavaScript Class and Promise  Advance JavaScript  Working with DOM  Event Listeners and BOM  HTML API and Ajax  JavaScript Oddities  This app contains all the important features of the programming language and everything to get you started in web development.   This app will be updated more often to cope with the ever-improving web technologies and new contents will be added. If you like our effort and our love for the other developers, please give us your feedback and comments or contacts us contactus@vigowebs.com.  We strongly hope this app will help you to reach your goal in your leaning and all your future endeavors.
